TopicTitle: What happened to Subassembly loader and it's patch?

Articles.Content: On KSPSP, the original subassembly loader is unavailable, a 404 error. The compatability patch is also gone. what happened to it?
i dunno, i've been trying to upload a private mod and it gives me 404 when done... maybe spaceport is broken?

I just looked, and I also cannot find, either, because apparently, it was taken down due to copyright issues. At least I got it before it was taken down.

Edit: Found the mod and the patch using the power of Google. However, I am afraid if I give the links for them, they will be removed by the mods, so if you really want it, you have to find it yourself.

Edited June 24, 2013 by rryy

Thanks for the heads up that it is still out there to be found, I will have to do the same. People always have to take the legalities of everything and run like madmen with them. Quit the stupidity and let people get subassembly loader and edtools working again, game is a pain in the ass without these simple tools and honestly should have been integrated long ago.
It was removed from the KSP network due to copyright issues, so please do not post redistribution links.
